Uses of Class
tetra.logic.Block

  • Packages that use Block 
    Package Description
    tetra.logic  

    • Uses of Block in tetra.logic

      Methods in tetra.logic that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block Tetromino.getBlock(Direction orientation, int x, int y)
      Returns the block in the specified (x, y) position, or null if the position is empty.
      Block Piece.getBlock(int x, int y) 
      Block Matrix.getBlock(int x, int y)
      Returns the block at the specified (x, y) position in this matrix, or null if the position is empty.
      Methods in tetra.logic with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Matrix.setBlock(int x, int y, Block block)
      Replaces the element at the specified position in this matrix with the specified block.
